lenders.name: anthony
lenders.occupation: self employed in property maintenance and repairs
lenders.loan_because: i hope to make a difference to others lives so they too may do the same to others one day.
lenders.occupational_info: i do mainly maintenace work to residential homes including painting, all types of repairs, gardening, cleaning and mostly anything that i am capable of.

lenders.name: Katrin
lenders.loan_because: "It is better to light one small candle than to curse the darkness." Confucius

lenders.name: Harriette
lenders.loan_because: I'm grateful for a good life and maybe having a little bit extra.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with college students who have disabilities.

lenders.name: WHBC
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference and help change people's lives.  God has blessed us so we could in turn bless other people.  We hope our efforts might bring someone closer to the saving graces of Jesus Christ.
lenders.occupational_info:
West Haven Baptist Chruch exists to see...
People Saved,
Lives Changed, and
Jesus Glorified.

lenders.name: Traci
lenders.loan_because: I have so much

lenders.name: Hazel
lenders.loan_because: With a small amount of money you can help people to start enterprises, gain confidence with their success and vastly improve the quality of their lives and the lives of their families.

lenders.name: Tamara Cristine
lenders.loan_because: I'm encouraged by the borrowers' stories
lenders.occupational_info: I was a Kiva Fellow in Mongolia & a volunteer consultant in the Kiva SF office.  Check out XacBank loans on Kiva :)

lenders.name: Tami
lenders.loan_because: I love to see people fulfilling their dreams and being able to help that be possible.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: My gripes are small compared with the challenges most of these people face, lending allows me to help those with less opportunities than I have. It reminds me how lucky I am to live in a first world country. Sounds noble but no, I am just trying to keep grounded.
lenders.occupational_info: My work? Not really what I would like to be doing for 50 hours a week, but it does pay me. I'd much rather be riding my bike, travelling, or sitting with a book in one hand and a beer in the other (but um... none of those will pay me).

lenders.name: Henny
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to make a better life for themselves and I want to show my son  that  not everybody has the same oppertunities as he has in this world.

lenders.name: Stefan
lenders.loan_because: I believe that "teaching someone how to fish" can be very helpful in many cases.
lenders.occupational_info: As a physical therapist my clinic attempts to help anyone with neck- and back pain.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I want others around the world to share in the opportunities of democracy and free-markets.
lenders.occupational_info: I help in the development of software programs for the banking industry.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I want to help to enable people with limited resources to make their lives better for themselves, their families and their communities.

lenders.name: Cyprus
lenders.loan_because: Cyprus Moments believes in our childrens future

lenders.name: Mary

lenders.name: Andrea

lenders.occupational_info: I learn stuff! I go to the local community college. I've also applied for a few part-time jobs, but haven't heard back from them yet.

lenders.name: Nancy & Jim
lenders.loan_because: We have been fortunate to have many friends who have given us help and encouragement along the way. We try to do what we can each day to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Nancy manages our local hospital's  accounts receivable department & teaches classes at the community college. Jim manages the maintenance department at a local resort.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I have so much and with Kiva it takes very little to help other women achieve their goals and dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I help create afforable housing so that families can spend their energy and money to improve their lives without having to worry about paying the rent.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people out there that work hard to make their lives & families lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I build web sites & advertising campaigns to sell different brands, products & services.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Teaching others to fish is better than giving fish away. Kiva is the best way to spread prosperity that I've found.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.occupational_info: I help improve public education for children in my community.

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: I  want to help others improve the quality of their lives .

lenders.loan_because: i like to help people,and it will make this world a better place.

lenders.name: Kristin and Alan

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I want to give those with less access to capital an opportunity to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the automotive business as an International Marketing Manager.

lenders.name: Kathy & Bob
lenders.loan_because: We have a great amount of respect for people trying to make an honest living.  We have received a fair amount of help in our lives and appreciate the opportunity to help others.

lenders.name: Susanne
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help someone.

lenders.name: Claudia
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping to help and maybe  like this make a better world?!?!?!...
lenders.occupational_info: I am a specialist in hand therapy helping people to recover after any kind of hand injury,enabeling  them to go back to their work and hobbies.

lenders.occupational_info: Matthew is working on a PhD in Geography.  He is emphasizing the development of new computer algorithms to better understand the phenomenon of drought in space and time.

lenders.occupational_info: Hmmm.

lenders.loan_because: ....this is one of the most convincing initiatives to help people getting a fulfilled and active life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a passionate musician (violin, viola) and believe in the power of music to make friends and create peace!

lenders.name: Lesley
lenders.loan_because: I want to see others succeed and prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: Non-fiction writer, author and speaker.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky, not rich, but with Kiva I can support people trying to help themselves and their families
lenders.occupational_info: I help children who can not live with their parents find loving and safe homes

lenders.name: Steffen
lenders.loan_because:
I've got what I need for myself and still have a surplus for others.
And lend money repaid can be used again (and again and....)..

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: opening my heart and my hand to others makes me more at peace with myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I have spent over 30 years caring for the elderly, mostly in their own homes,  helping them to live the best life possible for as long as they live.

lenders.name: Barry
lenders.loan_because: Its a great way to help people you may never have had the chance to meet otherwise

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Good economics can change the world.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I care about  people

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: I've had tough times and appreciate need, frustration, and hope.  Life is easier now, and I want to share.
lenders.occupational_info: To give children the academic and life skills tools that they will need to become the best citizens for our world.

lenders.name: Fiona
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I work on strategy for large scale organisational change and also help business executives to understand better why they make the decisions they do and how they can grow and improve.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: The Violet Crowns
lenders.loan_because: To honor our dear friend Mary who had a very generous heart.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: to be honest, it just feels so good to know that in some way maybe I can be of service to someone else as hundreds of people have helped me throughout my many ventures.
lenders.occupational_info:
When we decided to launch a company called Mental Messages in March 2004, we loved the name, and we had a vague idea that the company would have something to do with inspiration, motivation and personal development, but other than that, we had no grand plan.
Now with a little time into our exploration and evolution, and with the release of our magazine “mental messages” we have a clear idea of “what we want to be”, a company that focuses all of it’s efforts on sharing ideas, stories and resources that inspire people to explore and tap into their own vast pool of personal potential.
For us we truly can’t think of a better way to “make a living”.
Kim, Jennifer and Jay Jacobs

mental messages
"it all begins with the seed of an idea"

lenders.name: Cristina
lenders.loan_because: I can help someone to help themselves, and that way they can in turn help their communities and families and the next generation.

lenders.name: Lisa and Aaron
lenders.loan_because: This is our way to help others achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Belinda
lenders.loan_because: The people are trying hard to improve the lives of themselves, their families and communities and are out there 'having a go'.

lenders.name: Staci Lichterman
lenders.loan_because: the old adage works - helping people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Nathan & Kristen
lenders.loan_because: The greatest thing that one can do is to do something for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: Nathan is the editor of a trade newspaper, writes poetry and fiction, and edits freelance. Kristen works full time at a Catholic elementary school.

lenders.name: Norman Family
lenders.loan_because: Micro lending is an easy way for us to make a big difference in someone's life.  We believe in hard work of any kind.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with families and children that are at risk of being separated because of a variety of mental health, behavioral or legal issues.  I teach them skills to help them stay together.

lenders.name: Shinjiro
lenders.loan_because: all human beings deserve better lives.
lenders.occupational_info:
I was born on Oct. 18th, 1967.
 I have spent most of my life in Osaka and Tokyo, Japan, but I have lived in Frankfurt, Chicago, and London with my wife.
I traveled many countries during twenty years including North America, South America, Asia, Europe, and Africa.
My experience told me that the world is worth living.

I am lucky enough to have a good job and I have almost nothing to worry about my life. 
So I think it is about time to start helping other people.
I seriously hope to have a world without poverty and war.

lenders.name: Marie-Pierre
lenders.occupational_info: Je protege la nature des activités humaines (I protect nature from the activity of human)

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a difference to someone's life and be able to give back to the global community.
lenders.occupational_info: I proudly work for the Australian Red Cross Blood Service in Melbourne Australia as a Technician processing whole blood donations into it's different components.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I've been fortunate and I feel it is incumbent upon me to do what I can to help others less fortunate than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I run the BEST tanning salon in Houston, Texas!!!

lenders.name: Patricia & Spencer
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to live a comfortable life with two incomes and no children to feed. By sharing and lending to others, we hope to give more people around the world the opportunity to live well and provide for their children.
lenders.occupational_info:
Patricia helps raise awareness and educate others in her community about poverty, violence and homelessness in the U.S.

Spencer is an architect and builder working on small, smart remodels for friends and neighbors.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: Poverty is destabilizing.  People are less likely to destroy their communities if they're invested in them!

lenders.name: Lee Wilson
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: Disability Access Consultant, advocate for dignified equitable access into and throughout the built environment, supporter of human and animal rights

lenders.name: MAQSOOD
lenders.loan_because: my wife has a diploma in dressmaking and she wants to earn for our family.
lenders.occupational_info: my wife,s work to designe the dresses.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who are trying to help themselves, and Kiva makes me feel more directly connected.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on customer sites around the world, helping my company's clients use our software better.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: Because I believe that Social entrepreneurs can reclaim the definition of "value"

lenders.name: Doann
lenders.loan_because: ...To those who much is given, much is expected.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: People are great, governments suck.

lenders.occupational_info: Wildlife and Conservation Biology

lenders.name: greg + kai
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate to be able to help and we want to learn.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: ...we reap what we sow.
lenders.occupational_info: I help customers solve business problems with software, and provide technical advice.

lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a welfare organisation and take care of the telephones, computers and networked servers.

lenders.name: Gil
lenders.loan_because: I rather help someone buy a fishing rod rather than give them a fish.
lenders.occupational_info: Doing what I can to make sure Government is doing a positive job.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate to travel to many countries and I have seen how a little can go a long long way. I want to help these countries grow so all their people may prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses find ways to improve their products. I am married and have two daughters, 14 and 9.

lenders.name: Brian & Kris
lenders.loan_because: We like to help people help themselves

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: The people of this planet need to live and work in cooperation and harmony with each other and the planet. If we dont take care of ourselves and this Earth we will all be up the creek without a planet.

lenders.name: Zai
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a third-year student at Yale University. When I'm not taking classes for the psychology major, I teach health education to high school students in New Haven; specifically workshops on contraception and healthy sexuality. This summer, I'll be teaching HIV/AIDS prevention in Arusha, Tanzania, and running a psychological study in my free time there.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: To share the benefits of chance I experience.

lenders.name: Hannah Family
lenders.loan_because: We like the idea that people can pull together to make the world a better place and to support people who are eager to make a difference in the lives of themselves and their families. And its the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Allen
lenders.loan_because: So little can have such a profound impact .

lenders.name: Robert Joseph Williams
lenders.loan_because: I read about this site in Bill Clinton's book 'Giving'. I hope that everyone who can will choose to help someone through this site with any donation possible. It is my duty to give back so that others may have a rewarding and fulfilled life. It is the very least I can do. 'The world is built on chesed.'
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked in a nuclear plant for almost 12 years. However, my real job is trying to be the best human being possible. I try but often fail, yet I continue to care deeply about those whose lives are a daily struggle. My wish is that everyone in the world have the chance to reach their potential and live a fulfilled and purposeful life. May it be so...

lenders.name: roberta
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful way I can help others . .. and I'm so impressed  with the spirit of the people.   I loan to honor them.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mother and a retired teacher.  That's my beautiful daughter Hannah in my photo

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to strive, specially if you do not have anyone to turn to for help. Sometimes you just need that tiny additional push.
lenders.occupational_info:
My work is very technical (and solution-oriented) but a great deal of it has to do with direct contact with people: with colleagues, business partners, Customers. And that's my favorite part!
I do get to travel a lot, which is very tiring, but at the same time I feel very priviliged for being given the oportunity to see the world.

lenders.name: Marian Koning
lenders.loan_because:
it is a direct, transparant and nice way to make a difference in someone’s life. I love the teamwork; a few small amounts - big succes!
Team Dutch Bloggers for Kiva

lenders.name: Dave and Laura
lenders.loan_because: We know it's not easy getting the capital you need to start or grow a business.  We've been helped by others in the past, and we're just trying to pay it forward!
lenders.occupational_info: We own several companies in Las Vegas, NV.  One is a watercraft rental business and the other is an online nutritional supplement business.

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world and  one of the ways to do that is to help  to empower people. To see the gifts we all have to share that enrich our planet. I love to travel and meet people from all different cultures. This is the greatest education we can offer to our children.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with their personal and spiritual development. A great deal of my work is  with children and young people, particularly those that most vulnerable. I try to inspire and help people to open to their uniqueness and their unlimited potential.
